personal.name: Anuj Jain

I love building end-to-end smart systems â€” from IoT devices to LLM-powered applications. I'm a 2025 Smart India Hackathon finalist and enjoy solving real-world problems with technology.

achievements: 2025 Smart India Hackathon Finalist (2nd among 88,221 teams)

experience.description: AI-Powered Book Startup - Worked on machine learning models and AI systems
Delivered 25+ Python automation projects including web scraping, API bots, and data pipelines for global clients

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Revolutionary AI-powered portfolio system: edit a single JSON file to get a complete interactive portfolio with an intelligent chatbot. Built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Features modern design, dynamic project showcases, and zero code required for updates.

projects.title: LeetConnect
projects.description: LeetConnect is a Chrome extension that connects you with friends and tracks LeetCode statistics in real-time. Stay motivated by seeing your friends' progress, get notified when they solve new problems, and manage your study group or teamâ€™s coding journey together. Features include real-time stats, friend management, auto-refresh, ranking change alerts, notifications, and more.

projects.title: Chess Trace
projects.description: Built an IoT-enabled chessboard using ESP32, multiplexers, and 64 reed switches with 98.2% move detection accuracy at 1/8th the commercial cost. Features real-time move logging to Firebase, a web dashboard for live analysis and replay, and Stockfish-powered engine integration. Led a 3-member team through hardware prototyping, firmware development, cloud setup, and user testing with 20+ players.

projects.title: Insurance Premium Prediction API
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable Insurance Premium Prediction API using FastAPI, following industry best practices for modular architecture, input validation, and error handling. The API predicts insurance premium categories based on user input, offers robust documentation via Swagger UI, and includes Docker deployment support. Developed clear project structure, health check endpoints, and seamless integration for production environments.

projects.title: IntelliPrice
projects.description: IntelliPrice is a machine learning-powered web application that predicts the price of a laptop based on its specifications. Built with Streamlit, it features a clean interface, fast predictions, and easy deployment via Docker. The model uses key attributes like brand, CPU, RAM, storage, GPU, and screen size for accurate real-time price estimates.

projects.title: SpamSense
projects.description: SpamSense is an AI-powered tool that predicts whether your marketing emails will land in the inbox or spam folder. Designed for agencies to optimize campaign deliverability before sending, it features a Streamlit-based web interface and a scikit-learn machine learning model trained on real spam datasets.

projects.title: PopcornPicks
projects.description: PopcornPicks is a movie recommender web app built with Streamlit. Select a movie you like and get personalized recommendations with detailed information and posters. Uses machine learning to suggest similar movies based on your selection. Developed model using movie metadata and similarity matrix.

projects.title: Pralay Mitra
projects.description: AI-powered disaster management system to assist government officials during emergencies. Features interactive dashboard, real-time high-risk city alerts, AI chatbot (Gemini API) for response planning, and centralized resources for food, shelter, and medical aid.

projects.title: hideFlare: CDN Obfuscation Detection System
projects.description: Python tool to uncover real hosting details of websites protected by Cloudflare. Automates subdomain enumeration, SSL analysis, ASN/org/GeoIP lookups, historical IP resolution, and outputs results for security researchers. Used for SIH 2024 finalist project for MP Police.

projects.title: Monitoring System for TBFs
projects.description: Developed a condition monitoring system for Tunnel Booster Fans (TBFs) using machine learning. Jupyter notebooks and ML models for anomaly detection and preventive maintenance based on sensor data.

projects.title: Python Automation Suite
projects.description: Delivered 25+ Python automation projects for global clients, including web scraping, API bots, and data pipelines. Built GenAI-powered chatbots and autonomous agents using LangChain, LangGraph, and OpenAI APIs, reducing manual work by 60%.

projects.title: Fun With Filters
projects.description: A web app where users can upload images and apply a variety of fun image filters, built using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Try out creative filters and see instant results in your browser.

internship.workStyle: Fast learner, team player, problem solver
internship.goals: Join an innovative team building AI-powered solutions. I want to contribute to meaningful projects while growing my skills in enterprise-level development.

funFacts: Smart India Hackathon finalist among 88,000+ teams

Love solving complex problems with simple solutions

personality.motivation: Building technology that makes a real impact on people's lives
